title: Agrela
body: The first individual known to have come to this island and to have used this surname was Fernão Álvaro de Agrela, who was a native of Alenquer and who moved to Madeira around the 1480s, and of whom Manuel Ferraz makes mention in the poem A Insulana.

Fernão Álvaro de Agrela: First known individual with this surname on the island

1480: Arrival of Fernão Álvaro de Agrela in Madeira
